name: Just Kiss Her Already!
description:
Just Kiss Her Already! is a fluffy girls love story about Nanala (from Just Kiss Him Already!) attempting to get a girlfriend!

Features:

✿  ~4k words

✿  A nameable side character

✿  ~ 20  minutes of gameplay

✿ 1920 x 1080 resolution

My project for NaNoRenO 2023!  

This VN was completed  in March 2023 with the help of my sister!

Much like the first game, I've documented the progress if anyone's interested in seeing how everything went on a week to week basis!

You don't need to play JKHA to enjoy this game! (But if you haven't played the first, I recommend it!)

Credits: 

Character Art - RaspberryBell

Story/Background art- Ekkoberry

Music + Sfx- TAM Music Factory,  Sounddogs, Carl (Thank you again!)

I hope you enjoy it ♥

(Small edit where I left in a rougher art of the plushies than intended all fixed!)
